title: Looking to start streaming, needs some advice about hardware.
body:
Despite having a built PC I am still kind of a noob with computers and so any help would be appreciated. 
My current set up is: 

GPU: GeForce GTX760
CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4690K CPU @ 3.5GHz
Memory: 8.00 GB RAM 
OS: Windows 10

I use Shadow play to stream and for the most part it works, I just get a kind of low FPS. It varies between 14-30 which isn't the best. 

My speedtest got me 66 mbps download, and 4.09 mbps upload. 

So what should I upgrade if I want to see an increase in my FPS?

replies.body: GPU, slap a 980 in there and you're good to go
